column5: Does anybody know if the season is open right now, or opens this Sat? It's literally a borderline case between 2 zones. What rule applies here? thx
It's been open since last weekend... It's zone 16.
Thx, Bill. i was looking in the paper copy of the regs and could not find it, then went on the website and got lost among the maps.
Severn starts at Couch and ends in Gbay.  No part of it is in Zone 17.
Anyone fish the Severn just down from Couch?  I never have (Well I haven't since I was a kid) I usually fish below Sparrow and above Gloucester.
I hope to go to the section between sparrow and the falls on Fri. Anyone know of a good launching point?
